content: in this legal case a court in spoleto has issued a decision between two parties the defendant has been ordered to repay the plaintiff €5500000 which represents the plaintiffs share of a jointlyowned account the defendant had made unauthorized withdrawals and transfers from the account without the plaintiffs knowledge violating the legal community property regime the defendants defense claiming the withdrawals were for family obligations was deemed irrelevant the court clarified the legal principles regarding community property and dissolved the legal community the defendant is also responsible for paying the plaintiffs legal costs
